title.rendered: FLASH SALE: Rafting Discounts for this Weekend

content.rendered:
Looking for some great savings on white water rafting trips this weekend? Maybe you’re hoping to celebrate Mother’s Day on a thrilling river adventure? AVA Rafting is having a flash sale on trips this weekend! Tale advantage of our whitewater rafting discounts for trips for this weekend, Friday, May 12th – Sunday, May 13th.

20% Off Browns Canyon Sizzler Trips this Weekend

Head out on our Browns Canyon Sizzler Full Day Rafting Trip this weekend for 20% off! Raft through a National Monument and enjoy a riverside sizzling fajita lunch on this thrilling full day of rafting. Use promo code SIZZLER20 when you book this trip, or mention this deal when you call. This deal is good on Browns Canyon full day trips this Friday, May 12th – Sunday, May 14th. Browns Canyon Sizzler trips start at 9:30am. Offer expires May 14th. Not valid on any other Browns Canyon trips.

BROWNS CANYON SIZZLER TRIP

Rafting Browns Canyon Colorado: the ultimate Colorado river rafting experience! The full day Browns Canyon Sizzler is a great trip for the whole family – a great option for first-time rafters and a can’t-miss for experienced paddlers. Browns Canyon on the Arkansas River offers thrilling whitewater appropriate for a wide range of folks. Take in the impressive mountain and canyon scenery as you raft through a proposed Federal Wilderness Area. Appropriate for the younger members of your group, but still exciting for the older kids and adults, rafting Browns Canyon is your chance to enjoy Colorado whitewater rafting for all ages and ability levels!

You’ll get valley-wide, panoramic views of over a dozen 14,000-ft peaks. You’ll have just enough time to get used to working as a team before you hit the first blast of rapids.  Once you’re inside Browns Canyon, the stunning granite walls rise up to either side while the thrilling rapids continue! Halfway through the canyon, we’ll break for our signature sizzling fajita lunch by the edge of the river.  Now is a great chance to kick back and take in the jaw-dropping views of the Collegiate Range, a chain of 14,000 foot mountains looming to the west.  Browns Canyon shows you Colorado beauty at its best as it runs through a proposed National Monument, so don’t forget to keep an eye out for local bird life and other wildlife!  Or, just kick back and enjoy the sound of the river rushing by as you prepare for even more excitement on the second half of your trip. 

15% OFF ADULTS ON THE COLORADO RIVER THIS WEEKEND

Take 15% off adult rates on our Colorado River trips this weekend! Book your scenic float, overnight rafting trip, inflatable kayak or stand-up paddleboarding trip for this Saturday, May 13th – Sunday, May 14th to save on adult rates. Kids already raft 1/2 price on the Colorado River! Use code KREMMLING15 when you book online, or mention this deal when you call. Offer expires May 14th. Check out the available trips for this deal below:

1/2 DAY SCENIC FLOAT

This wonderful Colorado River float trip is a gently flowing section that is inviting to all ages. You’ll encounter a few small rapids as the Colorado River winds through the Gore Range and Mountain Ranchland. This is a relaxing day with time to sunbathe, swim or just relax and enjoy the day on your Colorado River rafting trip. The Colorado float half day trip is available two departures per day. This trip departs from our Kremmling Outpost, where you will check in and load an AVA vehicle for the 30-minute drive to the Colorado River. We run from Pumphouse Recreation Area to Radium on this trip. Read More>>

FULL DAY SCENIC FLOAT

Experience the natural beauty of the Colorado River on our Upper Colorado Full Day Float trip! You’ll experience a gently flowing section of the Colorado River that is inviting to all ages. Here you’ll encounter a few small rapids as you winds through the Gore Range and mountain ranch land.

You’ll meet for our Upper Colorado Full Day trip from the quiet town of Kremmling and quickly immerse yourself in all that the Colorado wilderness has to offer you! Let your cares slowly melt by the wayside on this delightful full day adventure. Explore the breathtaking Colorado scenery or just kick your feet up during our lunch break on the river. Listen as your guide provides fascinating history and stories about the surrounding area and points out the historic mining cabins scattered along the riverside. Look for the natural hot spring nestled along the river’s bank and keep an eye out for the many birds and animals that are abundant in the area.  The occasional passenger train will rumble by as sunbathe, slip into the river for a quick swim, or just relax on the raft.

 

 

24 HOURS ON THE UPPER COLORADO

This trip offers something for everyone!  Enjoy wildlife, serenity, and natural beauty that only the Colorado River can offer.  You’ll have plenty of time to take in historic cabins, scenic waterfalls, and steep canyon walls towering over 100′ above your head. Bald eagles, black bears, and the endangered Colorado river otter are often seen on this fun section of the river.

Radium hot springs offers an additional chance for relaxation.  After arriving at camp, you’ll have plenty of time for hiking, fishing, fossil hunting, or just relaxing beside the river while your guides prepare a delicious and hearty dinner. Following a good night’s sleep and filling breakfast, you’ll be ready to head back out to the river for a morning of more fun and relaxation, including time in our inflatable kayaks or on our standup paddleboards.

3 DAYS ON THE UPPER COLORADO

Our 3 Day, 2 Night river rafting trip on the famous Colorado River is an experience you’ll never forget. Float through beautiful canyons, play in an inflatable kayak, and try your hand at stand-up paddleboarding. In the evening, you’ll enjoy beautiful riverside camping with hearty meals and a sky full of stars. This remote overnight river trip also offers a chance to see Colorado wildlife, jump in the refreshing river, play in the sand, and chat by the campfire.

This Upper Colorado rafting trip takes you away from it all. You’ll find yourself relaxing as soon as you push off from the shore. With no electronics to distract you or the kids, you’ll all reconnect in a way you forgot you could.

 

 

1/2 DAY INFLATABLE KAYAKS

Looking to take charge on the river? On AVA’s  Upper Colorado Inflatable Kayak ½ Day trip you can do just that! Whether you want to try something new or are seeking a little extra excitement or independence the Upper Colorado Inflatable Kayak trip is the perfect for you! This trip allows you to explore the beauty of the Upper Colorado River while splashing through the riffles at your pace.  A guide will accompany your group but you’ll be paddling your own inflatable kayak, or duo.

FULL DAY INFLATABLE KAYAKS

Want a little extra excitement or independence on the Upper Colorado trip? Try our inflatable kayaks! You can explore the beauty of the Upper Colorado while splashing through the rapids in your own stable, rubber kayak! A guide will accompany you but you’ll paddle your own boat. This trip allows you to explore the beauty of the Upper Colorado River while splashing through the riffles at your pace.  A guide will accompany your group but you’ll be paddling your own inflatable kayak, or duo.

1/2 STAND UP PADDLEBOARD

All the rage in river sports! Try the newest, most fun activity on the river – Stand Up Paddleboarding (SUP)! A low-impact activity that’s easy for never-evers to learn, you’ll stand up or kneel on a large, surfboard-shaped board and steer with a long paddle as you navigate down the river.

This section of the Upper Colorado River – through Little Gore Canyon – is the perfect spot to try this adventure. The gentle Class II riffles and flat water create a good learning environment with the option for additional challenges if you’re up for it!  There are a couple more adventurous Class II-III sections as well so it’s a great way to up the excitement a bit on our Upper Colorado Scenic Float.

 

Interested in more deals from AVA Rafting & Zipline? Check out all the available deals and discounts on rafting, ziplining and more on our Deals page! If you have any questions or would like to book your trip with our Trip Specialists, give us a call at 877-RAFTING (877-723-8464). Happy Rafting!
